parameters.name: consumerGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the consumer group whose subscriptions you want to query.

If you do not configure this parameter, the subscriptions of all consumer groups on the specified instance are queried.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraMQ for RocketMQ instance.

parameters.name: topicName
parameters.description: The topic name. If you do not specify this parameter, all subscriptions of the consumer group are queried.
